website_summaries.verdict: A good spa slipper alternative if you don't like traditional fuzzy fabric on your foot.
pros: Uses a waffle fabric that is easy and comfortable on bare skin
Waffle design adds extra grip to the bottom of the slipper, keeping it from slipping around in wet conditions
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: One-size-fits-all design is too large or small for feet on the extreme ends

customer_reviews.title: So they're fine..
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much from these in the way of durability, which I think is reasonable given the price. They're basically hotel-style single use. We bought these for a guest who was staying for 2 weeks, to wear as house slippers. By the end of the stay the toe portion had split away from the sole and they were fit only for the trash. So they're fine... but don't expect them to hold up.
customer_reviews.author: benjy1507

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t expect to use them for years
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy but nice and light. These weren’t bought to be used daily (thankfully because I don’t know how long they would hold up), but they lasted as long as I needed them to. I mean, they are spa/hotel slippers so no shock there. Look cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Kate N.

customer_reviews.title: Waffle closed house shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great house shoes for when you get out of shower. I have had surgery and have to be very careful not to fall. These house shoes are great in that way. I put them on just as I get out of shower and they help with drying my feet as well as helping me to not slip and fall. They are very comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Debi McKibben

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a guest room offering!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are good for what I wanted them for. Two pairs are now in my guest room closet along with 2 white robes. They are not plush in any way, but nice to offer to guests!
customer_reviews.author: DianaJane

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight for Summer, a Little Too Wide
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking, but a lot of allowance for width and no control possible with toes as these are not open-toed. Non-slip bottoms, a nice feature. My husband got a black pair that has an open-toed design-- I've worn his and there is definitely more control when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria S

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than I expected but I was anticipating an exact ...
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than I expected but I was anticipating an exact replacement of a 4star hotel slipper I've worn for a year. On the bright side, a lot less expensive than a trip back to the hotel! Now that I've tried these, I'll probably buy the highest rated "batch of slippers" competitor which are cheaper dollar wise.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Anth

customer_reviews.title: Cute but WAY TOO BIG...
customer_reviews.text: Okay slippers for the price but they are HUGE. You would have to have really fat feet to get these to fit. I knew they would be too long but they are so big from side to side. I wear an 8.5. I think even if I wore a 10 they would be too big.
customer_reviews.author: KKitsel

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to take on vacation this summer. They are what I expected but I don't expect they'll last very long. The sole is very thin with no arch support. They are cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: New "traveling" slippers
customer_reviews.text: These replaced my "traveling" slippers which fell apart. The work perfectly and are great for warmer weather.
customer_reviews.author: boot gatherer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of shipping cost
customer_reviews.text: The product is simple and nice. but the shipping cost as much as the product. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: BATMAN

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Warm my feet without sweating
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Warm my feet without sweating. Like the fact they are flat. Just what I wanted and couldn't find locally. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Al Darby

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for guests that were coming to visit, it was a nice touch to have them in the room for their use.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy W Sanford-Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slippers for anytime of the year!
customer_reviews.text: These comfortable slippers are perfect for anytime and keep our feet nice and warm. We order them in bulk so that we could also have them for our guests to our home. They love them too! Very spa like.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about cheap hotel slippers? They came as expected and my boyfriend is thrilled lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great for staying in a dorm room during a conference--they kept my feet comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Usha

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 7 pairs (for my bridal party) super cute and exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 7 pairs (for my bridal party) super cute and exactly what I was looking for!! I'm very pleased, I do have to say, they are a little thin but for the price they are perfect!! I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stacey ruffini

customer_reviews.title: Great for around the house and to make guests feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these a few times now and will continue to as I need them. Great for around the house and to make guests feel pampered.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these slippers. But after 2 hours of wearing this happened... very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley T Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guestroom!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for short term use in guestrooms! I wanted something that made my guests feel pampered and rested. I also ordered the waffle bathrobes... I plan on having them embroidered with our initial on the breast pocket. I give it a definite five stars! I also ordered the open toed slippers as well. Equally as good a value.
customer_reviews.author: DFV

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Soles of slippers were not substantial. Have gotten similar slippers free before at a hotel and they had rubber soles. So I was expecting the same with these, Instead they seem to be cheaply made. Oh well you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: hermosalisa

customer_reviews.title: They are supposed to be one size fits all. ...
customer_reviews.text: They are supposed to be one size fits all. But that's obviously impossible, and my wife (Size 6 shoe) thinks these slippers are a little too big. Otherwise she likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Aldus Brokovich

customer_reviews.title: Wish they came in other sizes as well.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for ok quality and for overnight guests (they can take home with them).
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, good for one time use
customer_reviews.text: Ok, but not for long term use. Bottom fabric tears out after a few wears. But for disposable use, these are fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10 and still these were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wolbert

customer_reviews.title: makes her feel like she is in a luxurious hotel.
customer_reviews.text: we got similar slippers in Italy at a luxurious hotel My wife really likes these even though it does not have the hotel symbol embroidered on it.
customer_reviews.author: Famousk1

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and great fit and a great birthday gift.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and they are comfortable.My wife had been searching in local stores but none had my size. Just like the ones I first experienced at 5 Star hotel!
customer_reviews.author: Judith A.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They're a little too large for me..women's size 8..they kind of fall off of my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Boeke McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and keeps my feet dry after the jaccuzzi. It makes walking into the house much cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Waffle Closed Toe Adult Slippers Spa Hotel Slippers for Women and Men
product_meta.description: CottonAge waffle closed toe made of 65% cotton 35% polyester, hotel/spa slippers with waffle bathrobe.
feature_bullets: Slippers Made From 65% Top Quality Cotton, 35% Polyester
Waffle Closed Toe Slippers, Non Skid
